machine_disallowed_areas.value: [] if idex_print_mode == 'standard' else [[[-(abs(machine_head_with_fans_polygon[0][0]) + abs(machine_head_with_fans_polygon[2][0])) / 2, machine_depth / 2], [-(abs(machine_head_with_fans_polygon[0][0]) + abs(machine_head_with_fans_polygon[2][0])) / 2, -machine_depth / 2], [machine_width / 2, -machine_depth / 2], [machine_width / 2, machine_depth / 2]]] if idex_print_mode == 'mirror' else [[[0, machine_depth / 2], [0, -machine_depth / 2], [machine_width / 2, -machine_depth / 2], [machine_width / 2, machine_depth / 2]]]

machine_start_gcode.value:
';Machine Model: {machine_name}
;Materials used: '+('T0 {material_type,0}' if 0 in extruderValues('extruder_nr') else '')+' '+('T1 {material_type,1}' if 1 in extruderValues('extruder_nr') else 'T1 {material_type,0}' if idex_print_mode!='standard' else '')+'
;Extruders used: '+('T0 {machine_nozzle_size,0} {machine_nozzle_type,0}' if 0 in extruderValues('extruder_nr') else '')+' '+('T1 {machine_nozzle_size,1} {machine_nozzle_type,1}' if 1 in extruderValues('extruder_nr') else 'T1 {machine_nozzle_size,0} {machine_nozzle_type,0}' if idex_print_mode!='standard' else '')+('
M109 T1 S'+('{material_print_temperature_layer_0,0}' if extruderValue(0,'material_print_temperature_layer_0') != 0 else '{material_print_temperature,0}')+'	;Heat extruder 1' if idex_print_mode!='standard' else '')+'
G21 		;metric values
G90 		;absolute positioning
M204 S{machine_acceleration} 	;set default acceleration
M205 X{machine_max_jerk_xy} Y{machine_max_jerk_xy} ;set default jerk
M107 		;start with the fan off
G28 X0 Y0 	;move X/Y to min endstops
G28 Z0 		;move Z to min endstops
G1 Z5 F200 	;safety Z axis movement
'+(('T0'+extruderValue(0,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode') if extruderValues('extruder_nr') == [0] else 'T1'+extruderValue(1,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode') if extruderValues('extruder_nr') == [1] else 'T1'+extruderValue(1,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode')+'T0'+extruderValue(0,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode') if adhesion_extruder_nr == 0 else 'T0'+extruderValue(0,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode')+'T1'+extruderValue(1,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode')) if idex_print_mode=='standard' else 'T1'+extruderValue(1,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode')+'T0'+extruderValue(0,'purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode'))+(';standard mode' if idex_print_mode=='standard' else 'M605 S6 	;mirror mode' if idex_print_mode=='mirror' else 'M605 S5 	;duplication mode')+'
G4 P1
G4 P2
G4 P3
'

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 S0 T0               ;left extruder heater off
M104 S0 T1               ;right extruder heater off
M140 S0                  ;heated bed heater off
M204 S{machine_acceleration} ;set default acceleration
M205 X{machine_max_jerk_xy} Y{machine_max_jerk_xy} ;set default jerk
G91                      ;relative positioning
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 Y+10 F12000 ;move Z up a bit and retract filament
G28 X0 Y0                ;move X/Y to min endstops so the head is out of the way
M84                      ;steppers off
G90                      ;absolute positioning
